createProduct(string,uint256).details: Only a CREATOR can call this function

params._copies: Amount of tokens inside the product

getNextSequentialIndex(uint256,uint256,u.details: Uses a loop, do not call this from a non-view function!

params.endingIndex: Index of the product to search
params.productID: Index of the product to search
params.startingIndex: Index of the product to search

getProductCount().details: Use with get product to list all of the products

hasTokenInProduct(address,uint256,uint25.details: Loops are expensive in solidity, so don't use this in a function that requires gas

getNextSequentialIndex(uint256,uint256,u.notice: Loops through a range of tokens inside a product and returns the first token without an owner

getProductCount().notice: Returns the number of products on the contract

hasTokenInProduct(address,uint256,uint25.notice: Loops over the user's tokens looking for one that belongs to a product and a specific range

mintedTokensInProduct(uint256).notice: Returns the number of tokens inside a product
